paper_abstract: Starting with this issue, a new public policy technology track will appear in each installment of IEEE Internet Computing in 2006. This track will explore the relationships between IT technology deployment and policies along with the policy-related factors that affect the deployment of specific technologies. In this installment, the authors describe their vision of what to expect in future issues and issue a call to arms to build a like-minded community.
paper_title: Policies and IT technologies: A puzzle of two pieces
